title: cleandesk policy
extract: A clean desk policy instructs that all employees must clear their desks at the end of each work day. ... Following a clean desk policy will help your organization reduce the risk of information theft, fraud, or a security breach caused by sensitive information being left unattended and visible in plain view.Jul 1, 2015
